metadata.name: The Bridge #1/4
metadata.description:
Collectors Edition artwork by 0xdgb  
Rewarded to the first four collectors of The Bridge series.

The Bridge is a 5 piece series, consisting of four 1/1s and one edition. The 1/1s have been designed to stand alone as individual pieces, but also make up a wider landscape artwork when combined. 4 copies of the landscape edition were gifted to the initial collectors of the 1/1s.
